metadata.title: CVE-2019-14199 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Das U-Boot through 2019.07. There is anunbounded memcpy when parsing a UDP packet due to anet_process_received_packet integer underflow during an *udp_packet_handlercall.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
